document_data.name: Mestin Durmark
document_data.mainbody: '''Mestin "Troll" Durmark''' was a captain of the [[Freedom Riders]] of [[Daggerdale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She got her nickname from how she dealt with their enemies.
document_data.Personality: She had a wary, but friendly personality and always stuck to her duty. She would always help someone in need if their goals aligned with those of her group.
document_data.Equipment: Among her equipped gear were ''[[bracers of defense]]'', a ''+1 [[ring of protection]]'', and a ''+1 [[longsword]]''.
document_data.History: Mestin was next to [[Ariton Delmis]] as the most high-ranking member of the Riders under [[Randal Morn]]. When Randal disappeared, she helped Ariton to organize the liberation army in the [[Dagger Hills]].
